items.name: iconify-search-dialog
items.title: Iconify Search Dialog
items.description: Button that opens a dialog to search and browse icons grouped by collection.

.scroll-fade-y.mask: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent 0, black var(--top-fade), black calc(100% - var(--bottom-fade)), transparent 100%)
.scroll-fade-y.-webkit-mask: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent 0, black var(--top-fade), black calc(100% - var(--bottom-fade)), transparent 100%)

items.name: iconify-search-primitive
items.title: Iconify Search Primitive
items.description: Renderless component for Iconify icon search. Build custom UIs with search state, grouping, and selection via render props.
